an6.108:4.3: Bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind.
an6.108:4.5: To give up these three things you should develop three things.
an6.108:4.7: You should develop good bodily conduct to give up bad bodily conduct, good verbal conduct to give up bad verbal conduct, and good mental conduct to give up bad mental conduct.
an6.108:4.8: These are the three things you should develop to give up those three things.”
